title: PBE testers?
body: I want to know what riot is looking at the players the most that would make them a PBE tester. I also want to know what makes a good PBE tester and a bad PBE tester. Thanks for commenting.  (If a riot can tell me that would be the best)

replies.body: Aside from having an account in good standing (no behavioral punishments), I don't have any details on how PBE applicants are chosen beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your applications!

They aren't looking for much to become a PBE tester. They usually accept you if you don't get report often or be negative in-game. They also look for players with a specific role so they can test certain champions or items for that role.

Example:

They need a ADC role player to test out a new ADC champion/items.
